panels.description: Timeline showing pod scheduling states over time with color-coded segments for different states (waiting, delayed, running, completed)

targets.expr:
# Carbon delay - only included for pending pods that are delayed
sum by(exported_pod) (
  increase(compute_gardener_scheduler_carbon_delay_total[1m]) > 0
  and
  kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Pending"} * on(exported_pod, exported_namespace) group_left(scheduler_name) (kube_pod_info{scheduler_name="compute-gardener-scheduler"})
) * 5

# Price delay - only included for pending pods that are delayed
sum by(exported_pod) (
  increase(compute_gardener_scheduler_price_delay_total[1m]) > 0
  and
  kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Pending"} * on(exported_pod, exported_namespace) group_left(scheduler_name) (kube_pod_info{scheduler_name="compute-gardener-scheduler"})
) * 6

# Max delay exceeded - detect when scheduler gives up on delaying
sum by(exported_pod) (
  increase(compute_gardener_scheduler_scheduling_attempt_total{result="max_delay_exceeded"}[1m]) > 0
  and
  kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Pending"} * on(exported_pod, exported_namespace) group_left(scheduler_name) (kube_pod_info{scheduler_name="compute-gardener-scheduler"})
) * 7
